tags: None
review:
** **** ** *** **** ************ ***** I found out that I was pregnant after completing 3 months of pregnancy and have consulted Dr Sura mam at Rainbow Hospital Shollinganallur since then! 
Tensed? Worried? Panicked? 
The moment you see her smiling face it will vanish. She will give you complete positivity that your baby is fine.  
I had bit high sugar levels from my 7th month due to which my water levels had increased. She suggested me to cut down sugar and asked me to check sugar every week. She then suggested a diet and inspite of diet my sugar didn't come down only then she started tablet for me. 
I had no pains till 39th week. Since my sugar was high and she wanted me to have normal delivery she suggested to induce labour in 39th week and 3 days. 

Special mention about her before and after my labour. Since it was my first pregnancy, I was super scared and due to which heart rates of me and my baby were high. All she told me was not to worry, it's a natural process and asked me to relax and go with the flow. 

I was 4cm dilated at 10:30 pm and doctor rushed to the hospital after that. 
She patiently waited for me to be 10 cm dilated, gave me strength and kept motivating me. During the pushing stage she encouraged me to breathe in breathe out and asked me to push when the pain started. She gave me complete support.  Since my baby wasn't coming out she tried to pull her with vacuum  pump . After trying twice my baby didn't come out. She didn't give up and tried again after which my baby came out safely at 3:05 am.
I had a safe and normal delivery all credits to Dr Sura mam.

After my stitches process was done , doctor made sure to come and check on me by holding my hand and Since I was emotional, I poured my heart out to her and she patiently listened to me and consoled me and started to her home at 5 am. 

Really the best gynecologist ever! 
Pregnant? Trying to get pregnant? Go to her with complete faith. She will take care of the rest! Highly recommend all ladies to go to her! 
Living angel on earth üåé ‚ú®Ô∏è

tags: None
review:
I had been consulting Sura Pushpalatha mam for my second child delivery, she has been really caring and has excellent skills and experience interms of patients safety and always listens each and every concerns and provides assurance to make oneself believe. During the day of delivery also she helped alot interms of giving confidence and assurance that it's gonna be normal delivery.
Thank you mam for everything.
Regards,
Sangita Mondal

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I had a cervical cyst which was highly infected and my scans found it to be precancerous. At first i was very unsure and almost had 12 other consultations with other doctors, and all others were in an urge in the moment and scared me very badly. She was my 5th doctor i consulted luckily* *** * ****** *** *** ** *** **** ***** *** ** ***** She is friendly enough to hear all our fears n doubts and then tells us what is right to do without making us panic. I have been visiting so many gynics in chennai for past 9yrs for infertility issues, but never found someone so comfortable to talk. She made the scariest person in me to be bold n strong enough to face it. Atlast i ended up getting my surgery done by her and her post surgery talks and advises were also very good. I highly recommend her for people who are scared n worried to see gynics. Thanks mam, i am relieved from everything because you gave me confidence.

tags: None
review: Doctor is good. No doubt  but service from Gleneagles hospital Perumbakkam is too bad . I had bad experience today, Hospital administration does not have a common sense for pregnent women's. For changing doctor name ,they ask me to go with several procedure to get sign from attainder / department.people should think twice before going to global hospital, they don't care your critical situation of patient just they wanted to full fill own statement until you don't do . Admin will not allow you to go to doctor.  I won't suggest you to go to global hospital ... its a place for very bad administration.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I wanted to take a moment to express my gratitude for the type of care I‚Äôve received from you. The genuine concern and care you show truly help in ways I cannot express. I can‚Äôt begin to tell you how much I appreciate your willingness to listen to my concerns and spend ample time with me at each appointment. You make me feel like my concerns are valid and reasonable. You explain each topic in ways I can understand and the information you provide is extremely helpful. Thank you from the bottom of my heart for all of your help, wisdom, kindness and caring. Most doctors try to shuffle you in and out as quickly as possible and I never feel rushed by you. I leave feeling better after each visit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: very friendly and explains well about the problems. doctor is available for the patients at anytime. staffs are very kind and approachable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very friendly doctor. Provide answer to each of your queries.   Mostly on time and wait time is very less

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is very friendly and make patient to understand the problem easily. I have visited for more than three times to this clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very patient and genuine doctor. She spoke to me patiently. As my issue was not gynaecology oriented she directed me to the relevant department without taking any fees for herself.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Today i have met Doctor Sura in Global.She is very friendly and answers all your queries politely and waiting time is also less.
